title: Woman In Steamy Room Light Skin Tone

Woman In Steam Room Light Skin Tone
description: A woman in a steamy room, often depicted wearing a towel, suggesting relaxation, spa treatments, or a sauna experience. The light skin tone modifier indicates a specific skin color.

This emoji on Apple devices is perfect for conveying a sense of rejuvenation, spa experiences, or unwinding.
